e107Plugin.name: Owe Me!
e107Plugin.summary: Provides an overview of money that is owed to you. Ability to create entries, debtors, statuses.
e107Plugin.description: Provides an overview of money that is owed to you. You can create entries and include date, amount, debtor and a description of the entry. Also, one is able to edit the existing debtors and statuses.
